Test Name: Abnormal Prion Protein Detection (Real-Time Quaking Induced Conversion, RT-QuIC)
Purpose: To detect abnormal prion protein in spinal fluid using the RT-QuIC assay for diagnostic evaluation of prion diseases.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof container for CSF collection
Equipment: Real-Time Quaking Induced Conversion (RT-QuIC) instrument, centrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes with filtered tips, optical plate reader
